description: Default SROI valuation weights for buddy program activities
methodology: Values based on estimated social impact and time investment per activity

buddy_match.rationale: Initial connection established, foundation for future engagement

event_attended.rationale: Community participation, networking, cultural exchange per event

skill_share.rationale: Direct skills transfer, educational value, volunteer time (⭐⭐⭐ high impact)

feedback.rationale: Quality assurance, program improvement insights, relationship health indicator

milestone.rationale: Significant achievement, program completion, measurable progress (⭐⭐⭐ high impact)

checkin.rationale: Regular engagement signal, retention indicator, minimal time investment

investment.notes: Phase 1 simplified investment model. Phase 2 will include volunteer opportunity cost and variable platform costs.

companyOverrides.description: Companies can override these defaults through the API

example.rationale: Company X values skills transfer and completions more highly
